
{{alias}}( value )
    Test if a value is an empty array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    y: boolean
        boolean indicating if a value is an empty array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( [] )
    true

    > bool = {{alias}}( [1,2,3] )
    false

    > bool = {{alias}}( {} )
    false

    See Also
    --------
